Address: 6th Ave & W 11th St, New York, NY 10011
Description: Unkown alien sounds coming out of an establishment on 6th avenue.

Address: Allen St & Canal St., New York, NY 10002
Description: Cars driving by, as expected, and typical conversations from pedestrians.
Large crowd of people — a mix of tourists and creapy costumed characters. Tons of cars, including yellow taxis, and MTA buses were driving by. Occasionally, distant cheering could be heard.
Light sounds of cars driving by being interrupted by occasional short honks. Fading in and out are two groups of young people singing, and a latin music beat.
Mostly quiet except for sounds of monotonous cars and people, along with a random high-pitch screech.
Ascending train-station escalator sounds approach the outdoors of Whitehall Ferry Station. The mic then captures a street vendor selling Mexican fruit snacks, and conversations of passersby.

Address: Stuyvesant Ave & Halsey St, Brooklyn, NY 11233
Description: Vrooming cars driving down the street, stopping at a red light, and bodega customers conversing.

A group of runners distract their tiredness and fatigue with breathy conversations. Then, thunderous wind and a fading revving engine is heard. This is gradually followed by a bus parking and releasing its breaks, cars driving by Prospect Park, beeping sounds, and more of the sounds I mentioned previously.

Address: Woodpoint Rd & Skillman Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11211
Description: Silent except for the sound of my clothes rustling as I walked, moving car sounds, and strong wind blowing.

Address: Stillwell Ave & Surf Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11224
Description: Very intense wind gushing complimented by the rhythm of a rusty and faulty street sign, swinging back and forth. People talking and reacting to the chilly, windy weather are followed by piercing sounds of screeching train breaks.
Featuring people talking in english and spanish, booming of wood panels being dropped on the ground, and ending with a car honking in the background.

Address: MacDonough St & Malcolm X Blvd, Brooklyn, NY 11233
Description: To the left, cheerful children are playing at the El Shabazz Elementary School playground. This is followed by vrooms and wooshes of cars, MTA B14 buses, wind, and reverberating car honks.
Latin music coming from a portable speaker emerges from the left of the mic. This is complemented by people talking and birds chirping.
Bustling city sounds enhanced by cars driving by.
Cars and motorcycles driving under the 82 St - Jackson Hts train station, along with a crowd of pedestrians, and Mexican street vendors selling Tamales and Tacos.
Reverberating cars driving down the Flushing Avenue the 7 train zooming by on its way to its last stop (Queens-bound) Flushing-Main St.
Strong beach waves and loud coastal winds gusting.

Address: River Ave & 161st St, The Bronx, NY 10452
Description: Sound of cars driving by under a classic NYC bridge, cliche car honks, mic scratching against the fabric of my jacket, light wind blowing, more honking, and occasional dog barks.

Address: Walton Ave & E 170th St, The Bronx, NY 10452
Description: Bustling city sounds, featuring the beeping of a large truck backing up, pedestrians, and car driving by.
Wind gushing, and whooshing coming from Bronx cars and buses. This is followed by footsteps and a paper bag blowing in the wind and lightly hitting my leg.

Address: Bronx Park East &, Boston Rd, The Bronx, NY 10462
Description: Audio starts off with unraveling tape sounds coming from my friend, chain dog leash sounds, continues with people laughing and talking. Then the audio is taken over by lots of happy dogs barking and their owners having friendly conversations.

Address: Arthur Ave & 187th St, The Bronx, NY 10458
Description: Static or still noise accompanied by faint metal noises of clinking silverware from a restaurant with outdoor seating, and footsteps from people walking.
Feminine voice announcing Staten Island Ferry route and safety rules through a crispy-sounding intercom system.
A Loud fire truck siren fades in and out, followed by vrooming and whooshing sounds of cars driving by, and the deep voice of a man asking for a lighter.
Still noise and light wind accompanied by whooshing of cars driving by.
